verses.verse: And it came <S%G1096><s%> to pass, when <S%G3753><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> had made <S%G5055><s%> an end <S%G5055><s%> of commanding <S%G1299><s%> his twelve <S%G1427><s%> disciples, <S%G3101><s%> he departed <S%G3327><s%> there <S%G1564><s%> to teach <S%G1321><s%> and to preach <S%G2784><s%> in their cities. <S%G4172><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> when John <S%G2491><s%> had heard <S%G191><s%> in the prison <S%G1201><s%> the works <S%G2041><s%> of Christ, <S%G5547><s%> he sent <S%G3992><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> of his disciples, <S%G3101><s%>
And said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Are <S%G1488><s%> you he that should come, <S%G2064><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> do we look <S%G4328><s%> for another? <S%G2087><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to them, Go <S%G4198><s%> and show <S%G518><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> again <S%G518><s%> those things which <S%G3739><s%> you do hear <S%G191><s%> and see: <S%G991><s%>

The blind <S%G5185><s%> receive <S%G308><s%> their sight, <S%G308><s%> and the lame <S%G5560><s%> walk, <S%G4043><s%> the lepers <S%G3015><s%> are cleansed, <S%G2511><s%> and the deaf <S%G2974><s%> hear, <S%G191><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%> are raised <S%G1453><s%> up, and the poor <S%G4434><s%> have the gospel <S%G2097><s%> preached <S%G2097><s%> to them.
And blessed <S%G3107><s%> is he, whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> shall not be offended <S%G4624><s%> in me.

And as they departed, <S%G4198><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> began <S%G756><s%> to say <S%G3004><s%> to the multitudes <S%G3793><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> John, <S%G2491><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> you out into <S%G1519><s%> the wilderness <S%G2048><s%> to see? <S%G2300><s%> A reed <S%G2563><s%> shaken <S%G4531><s%> with the wind? <S%G417><s%>

But what <S%G5101><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> you out for to see? <S%G1492><s%> A man <S%G444><s%> clothed <S%G294><s%> in soft <S%G3120><s%> raiment? <S%G2440><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> they that wear <S%G5409><s%> soft <S%G3120><s%> clothing are in kings' <S%G935><s%> houses. <S%G3624><s%>

But what <S%G5101><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> you out for to see? <S%G1492><s%> A prophet? <S%G4396><s%> yes, <S%G3483><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, and more <S%G4055><s%> than a prophet. <S%G4396><s%>

For this <S%G3778><s%> is he, of whom <S%G3739><s%> it is written, <S%G1125><s%> Behold, <S%G2400><s%> I send <S%G649><s%> my messenger <S%G32><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> your face, <S%G4383><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> shall prepare <S%G2680><s%> your way <S%G3598><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> you.

Truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, Among <S%G1722><s%> them that are born <S%G1084><s%> of women <S%G1135><s%> there has not risen <S%G1453><s%> a greater <S%G3187><s%> than John <S%G2491><s%> the Baptist: <S%G910><s%> notwithstanding he that is least <S%G3398><s%> in the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> is greater <S%G3187><s%> than he.

And from the days <S%G2250><s%> of John <S%G2491><s%> the Baptist <S%G910><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> now <S%G737><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> suffers <S%G971><s%> violence, <S%G971><s%> and the violent <S%G973><s%> take <S%G726><s%> it by force. <S%G726><s%>
For all <S%G3956><s%> the prophets <S%G4396><s%> and the law <S%G3551><s%> prophesied <S%G4395><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> John. <S%G2491><s%>
And if <S%G1487><s%> you will <S%G2309><s%> receive <S%G1209><s%> it, this <S%G846><s%> is Elias, <S%G2243><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> was for to come. <S%G2064><s%>
He that has <S%G2192><s%> ears <S%G3775><s%> to hear, <S%G191><s%> let him hear. <S%G191><s%>

But whereunto <S%G5101><s%> shall I liken <S%G3666><s%> this <S%G5026><s%> generation? <S%G1074><s%> It is like <S%G3664><s%> to children <S%G3808><s%> sitting <S%G2521><s%> in the markets, <S%G58><s%> and calling <S%G4377><s%> to their fellows, <S%G2083><s%>
And saying, <S%G3004><s%> We have piped <S%G832><s%> to you, and you have not danced; <S%G3738><s%> we have mourned <S%G2354><s%> to you, and you have not lamented. <S%G2875><s%>
For John <S%G2491><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> neither <S%G3383><s%> eating <S%G2068><s%> nor <S%G3383><s%> drinking, <S%G4095><s%> and they say, <S%G3004><s%> He has <S%G2192><s%> a devil. <S%G1140><s%>

The Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> eating <S%G2068><s%> and drinking, <S%G4095><s%> and they say, <S%G3004><s%> Behold <S%G2400><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> gluttonous, <S%G5314><s%> and a drunkard, <S%G3630><s%> a friend <S%G5384><s%> of publicans <S%G5057><s%> and sinners. <S%G268><s%> But wisdom <S%G4678><s%> is justified <S%G1344><s%> of her children. <S%G5043><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> began <S%G756><s%> he to upbraid <S%G3679><s%> the cities <S%G4172><s%> wherein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> most <S%G4118><s%> of his mighty <S%G1411><s%> works were done, <S%G1096><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> they repented <S%G3340><s%> not:

Woe <S%G3759><s%> to you, Chorazin! <S%G5523><s%> woe <S%G3759><s%> to you, Bethsaida! <S%G966><s%> for if <S%G1487><s%> the mighty <S%G1411><s%> works, which <S%G3588><s%> were done <S%G1096><s%> in you, had been done <S%G1096><s%> in Tyre <S%G5184><s%> and Sidon, <S%G4605><s%> they would have repented <S%G3340><s%> long <S%G3819><s%> ago <S%G3819><s%> in sackcloth <S%G4526><s%> and ashes. <S%G4700><s%>

But I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, It shall be more <S%G414><s%> tolerable <S%G414><s%> for Tyre <S%G5184><s%> and Sidon <S%G4605><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%> of judgment, <S%G2920><s%> than <S%G2228><s%> for you.

And you, Capernaum, <S%G2584><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> are exalted <S%G5312><s%> to heaven, <S%G3772><s%> shall be brought <S%G2601><s%> down <S%G2601><s%> to hell: <S%G86><s%> for if <S%G1487><s%> the mighty <S%G1411><s%> works, which <S%G3588><s%> have been done <S%G1096><s%> in you, had been done <S%G1096><s%> in Sodom, <S%G4670><s%> it would have remained <S%G3306><s%> until <S%G3360><s%> this <S%G4594><s%> day. <S%G4594><s%>

But I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, That it shall be more <S%G414><s%> tolerable <S%G414><s%> for the land <S%G1093><s%> of Sodom <S%G4670><s%> in the day <S%G2250><s%> of judgment, <S%G2920><s%> than <S%G2228><s%> for you.

At <S%G1722><s%> that time <S%G2540><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said, <S%G2036><s%> I thank <S%G1843><s%> you, O Father, <S%G3962><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> and earth, <S%G1093><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> you have hid <S%G613><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things from the wise <S%G4680><s%> and prudent, <S%G4908><s%> and have revealed <S%G601><s%> them to babes. <S%G3516><s%>
Even so, <S%G3779><s%> Father: <S%G3962><s%> for so <S%G3779><s%> it seemed <S%G1096><s%> <S%G2107><s%> good <S%G2107><s%> in your sight. <S%G1715><s%>

All <S%G3956><s%> things are delivered <S%G3860><s%> to me of my Father: <S%G3962><s%> and no <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> knows <S%G1921><s%> the Son, <S%G5207><s%> but the Father; <S%G3962><s%> neither <S%G3761><s%> knows <S%G1921><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> man the Father, <S%G3962><s%> save <S%G1508><s%> the Son, <S%G5207><s%> and he to whomsoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> will <S%G1014><s%> reveal <S%G601><s%> him.
Come <S%G1205><s%> to me, all <S%G3956><s%> you that labor <S%G2872><s%> and are heavy laden, <S%G5412><s%> and I will give you rest. <S%G373><s%>

Take <S%G142><s%> my yoke <S%G2218><s%> on you, and learn <S%G3129><s%> of me; for I am <S%G1510><s%> meek <S%G4235><s%> and lowly <S%G5011><s%> in heart: <S%G2588><s%> and you shall find <S%G2147><s%> rest <S%G372><s%> to your <S%G5216><s%> souls. <S%G5590><s%>
For my yoke <S%G2218><s%> is easy, <S%G5543><s%> and my burden <S%G5413><s%> is light. <S%G1645><s%>
